clientSide.stubs

Class PlaygroundStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.PlaygroundStub

  • public class PlaygroundStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the playground

    It instantiates a remote reference to the playground. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
